text:
Introduction Antipsychotics are a class of medications used to treat

psychiatric disorders such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, and major

depressive disorder (1). THC, on the other hand, is a primary psychoactive

compound found in cannabis, which has been used for medicinal and

recreational purposes (2).

Pharmacological Interactions The combination of antipsychotics with THC

can lead to complex pharmacological interactions. Antipsychotics, particularly
